description: You find yourself alone in a stone chamber. Well, I'm here too but like I said, not helping. There is a door in the north end of the room.

east.input: You find a wall. Lovely stone and moss wall.

west.input: You're looking at a wall... and a rather annoyed spider.

up.input: We call that a ceiling, it's a ways up there though.

down.input: Despite your best efforts you fail to phase through the floor.

inventory.name: a strange note
inventory.description:
It's a note written in a language unknown to you.
Your best guess to its meaning is "Cats fear pickles" but
that's nonsense. Why would you even think that?

inventory.name: a tarnished coin
inventory.description: Well that's not worth much. Round though. 'Marui' one might say.
